content: 1 halloween crochet project spider and materials ● aran/worsted weight yarn in black and web poncho a small amount of red - i used red heart super saver by liz crafty woman shop ● ush/8 5 00mm crochet hook https //craftywomanshop etsy com ● yarn needle tips here is a great stitch guide by annie s craft store if you need help with any of the stitches in this pattern https //www anniescatalog com/pages/stitch guide/index html cid=3 pattern spider web poncho chain 85 and join being careful not to twist the chain r1 chain 1 single_crochet in same chain and in each chain around difficulty beginner/advanced beginner join 85 single_crochet ​ finished size 13 5 wide neck opening 17 ​ long r2 chain 2 half_double_crochet in same stitch and each around gauge n/a join 85 half_double_crochet ​ stitch guide chain s chain s st s stitch es ​ skip - skip a stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet single r3 chain 10 skip 4 sts *double_crochet in next st chain 7 repeat crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - from * around join to 3rd chain of chain 10 double_crochet treble_crochet - treble_crochet dtr - double treble_crochet trtr - triple treble crochet r4 chain 13 *treble_crochet in next double_crochet chain 9 repeat from * around join to 4th chain of chain 13 notes pattern instructions within all take ​ place in the same stitch © 2018 liz meehan crafty woman shop https //craftywomanshop etsy com 2 r5 chain 15 *treble_crochet in next treble_crochet chain 11 repeat from * around join to 4th chain of chain 15 r6 chain 18 *dtr in next treble_crochet chain 13 repeat from * around join to 5th chain of chain 18 r7 chain 21 *trtc in next dtr chain 15 repeat from * around join to 6th chain of chain 21 r8 chain 23 *trtc in next trtc chain 17 repeat from * around join to 6th chain of chain 23 r9 chain 25 *trtc in next trtc chain 19 repeat from * around join to 6th chain of chain 25 r10 chain 27 *trtc in next trtc chain 21 repeat from * around join to 6th chain of chain 27 r11 chain 29 *trtc in next trtc chain 23 repeat from * around join to 6th chain of chain 29 r12 chain 31 *trtc in next trtc chain 25 repeat from * around join to 6th chain of chain 31 fasten_off weave in ends © 2018 liz meehan crafty woman shop https //craftywomanshop wordpress com | https //craftywomanshop etsy com ​ ​ 3 spider abdomen r1 chain 4 9 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook join 10 double_crochet r2 chain 3 double_crochet in same st 2 double_crochet in each st around join 20 double_crochet r3 slip_stitch next 4 sts single_crochet half_double_crochet next st 2 double_crochet in next 4 sts 2 treble_crochet in next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next 4 sts half_double_crochet single_crochet in next st slip_stitch last 4 sts 32 sts fasten_off leave tail for
